title: The Villainess’ Son is Innocent - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Doting Parents   Empires   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Kingdoms   Multiple Timelines   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Royalty   Second Chance   Time Manipulation   Tragic Past   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Yoon Delico   윤델리코
description:
I became the daughter of the heroine in the novel I read in my previous life. The original story was over, and I was living a happy life with the buff of having the female lead as my mother.

“Velsia. I’m the only one who will love everything about you.”

The son of the villainess who suffered from madness.

Emil Callixst, an innocent child isolated because of the villainess’ sins. He, who inherited the madness of her mother, annihilated my family and when I died, I returned to the age of ten.

I tried to cure Emil’s madness to avoid death but…

“You’re the only one who saw me as me.”

“…Emil, wait a minute.”

“You’re the only one who reached out to me.”

But the boy I knew grew up better than anyone else.

“So you’re the only one who should be by my side.”

Contrary to my intentions, he ended up obsessing over me.

“I… I want you to keep pitying me.”

The child who grew up a lot now became a man and tried to hold onto me.>
